html: 9.27.17  12:20 pm   When I write down music, I always get confused about sharps, flats and natural symbols. Like if you have a note outside of the key signature and you put a flat,sharp or natural symbol on it, by the next measure are you supposed to assume that if that same note has no symbol then it's back to normal? Or if the note is altered in one clef, but not the other, do I put a sharp/flat/natural symbol on just the one clef and leave the other one unaltered?

9.27.17  11:51 am   So the story goes (if I remember correctly) that god created adam, then sometime afterwards created eve from one of adam's ribs... when god created animals, did god create only male animals, then created the females from the male's ribs? Or did god make male and female animals simultaneously? What about flowers? Did god make stamens before carpels?
